content.new: When a`Visual` is removed in `Scene::RemoveVisual()`, it calls `Scene::RemoveVisualizations()` in order to delete eventual additional GUI visualizations of the visual. It only removes these visuals if they are of the type `VT_PHYSICS` or `VT_SENSOR` (htt

issue.title: Arrows of `AxisVisual` are never removed from scene
